subject: order change SSN4303
description_text:
hi
I just placed an order from you. (Order #SSN4303)
I can see that I have ordered 4 pieces of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback.
It was only meant that I would need 2 pieces and not 4 pieces.
Is it possible that you can change the order and to 2 pieces.

 Kind regards Jesper Midtgaard

conversations.body_text: Hi Jesper Midtgaard,    Alright, we've updated your order for you. No need to worry.

hi again.
I am writing to you in connection with the order ( #SSN4303)
I had made, what is the status of it?
I can see, if I go into the order that there are still 4 pcs under Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback.
Even though you wanted to correct them to 2 pcs. And I can see that you have deducted the full amount for the entire order. and that means that I have paid for 4 pcs. Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor.

Kind regards
Jesper Midtgaard
________________________________
Hi Jesper Midtgaard,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have processed your refund and arranged for shipment.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2533700710139426
